Name: Joy Division
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange (or lemon) zest twist.
EXPRESS orange (or lemon) zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A 2:1 Dry Martini with a slug of triple sec and dashes of absinthe contributing zesty orange and subtle aniseed respectively.
History: Recipe created in 2008 by Phil Ward at Death & Co. , New York, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Joy Division contains 206 calories
